trapomino

Class UnionMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.UnionMap

  • public class UnionMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the UnionFind algorithm that will check to see if an Animal is trapped by blocks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int[][] id 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnionMap(int N, int M)
      This constructor initializes the id array and fills each location with a different integer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean find(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      This method checks to see if the two passed Positions in the array have the same value.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method prints out the UnionMap into the console and is used for debugging the UnionFind algorithm.
      void Unite(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      This method checks through every index in the 2D-array to see if it has the same value as the given Position.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public static int[][] id

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnionMap

        public UnionMap(int N,
                int M)
        This constructor initializes the id array and fills each location with a different integer.
        Parameters:
        N - - the length of the 2D-array
        M - - the width of the 2D-array

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public boolean find(Position pos1,
                    Position pos2)
        This method checks to see if the two passed Positions in the array have the same value.
        Parameters:
        pos1 - - the first set of indexes in the array
        pos2 - - the second set of indexes in the array
        Returns:
        true if the values are the same, otherwise return false

      • Unite

        public void Unite(Position pos1,
                  Position pos2)
        This method checks through every index in the 2D-array to see if it has the same value as the given Position. If any Position in the array has the same value as the given Position, it unites the 2 Positions with the same value.
        Parameters:
        pos1 - - the first set of indexes in the array
        pos2 - - the second set of indexes in the array

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method prints out the UnionMap into the console and is used for debugging the UnionFind algorithm.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String to be printed in the console
